level_calculation.description: Level based on total ducks interacted with (shot + befriended)

1.name: Duck Novice
1.description: Just starting out, ducks are trusting and easier to hit

2.name: Pond Visitor
2.description: Ducks are getting wary of you

3.name: Duck Hunter
3.description: Your reputation precedes you, ducks are more cautious

4.name: Wetland Stalker
4.description: Ducks flee at your approach, spawns are less frequent

5.name: Apex Predator
5.description: You're feared throughout the pond, ducks are very elusive

6.name: Duck Whisperer
6.description: Only the bravest ducks dare show themselves

7.name: Legendary Hunter
7.description: Duck folklore speaks of your prowess, they're extremely rare

8.name: Duck Deity
8.description: You've transcended mortal hunting, ducks are mythically scarce
